title: Discipline: What it is, how to develop it, and why you should
description: A lightning-fast read that will help you develop self-discipline in record time.From the Back Cover...We struggle with many things, such as dieting, saving money, and being on time. We make hosts of resolutions every January and disappoint ourselves by February.We all agree that discipline is a good thing, yet most of us would not describe ourselves as disciplined people. What is this elusive thing called discipline? Why is it important? How can it be developed? Find out within these pages.
author: Ken Parsell
